__e: I know that this costs five or six times more than the new RCF, and I know it's full of carbon fibre and all sorts of clever engineering that you can't reasonably expect to find further down the fiscal food chain,
I've theorized that carbon-based, fat-filled life could exist, but until today, I never had any proof.
We have the right to drive whenever, wherever, and whatever we want, but we need to understand the effects of the carbon footprint and realize the environmental damage cars are causing to our planet.
